name: Super Player (REMInduced)
description:
Super Player is an action game where you gain the ability to fly and the powers to blast enemies away with energy beams and blasts.

Explore the planet Volaris and discover the hidden artifacts to gain incredible powers.

As you charge your shot you get to use it once to fire an energy blast, or hold it long enough to fire off a destructive energy beam.

The AI is using a machine learning algorithm which is incrementally optimized through a genetic process. So the longer you play the better the AI will get, so don't worry if you see them chasing their own tail, they are learning.

The game stops at the unlock of the second power, will keep building this out more if you guys like the style and controls.

Hope you guys like the experience as much as I did, I've always wanted to fly in VR as well as do some cool energy blasts like in a certain anime.

Best of luck!
